static int __cvmx_flash_queury_cfi ( int  chip_id,
void *  base_ptr 
) [static]

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Query a address and see if a CFI flash chip is there.

Parameters:
chip_id Chip ID data to fill in if the chip is there
base_ptr Memory pointer to the start address to query
Returns:
Zero on success, Negative on failure
